languages.text: {n}Громкий голос сенешаля вызывает небольшой оползень зерна в одном из вскрытых контейнеров.{/n} "{mf|Его|Ее} Светлость Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, держатель{mf||ница} священного Патента прибыл{mf||а} за описью десятинного сбора".

{n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened containers.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."
languages.original_text: {n}Громкий голос сенешаля вызывает небольшой оползень зерна в одном из вскрытых контейнеров.{/n} "{mf|Его|Ее} Светлость Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, держатель{mf||ница} священного Патента прибыл{mf||а} за описью десятинного сбора".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened crates.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, holder of a sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

{n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened crates.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, holder of a sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

{n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened crates.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, holder of a sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

{n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened crates.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, holder of a sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

{n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened containers.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

{n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened containers.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

languages.text: {n}La voz atronadora del Senescal provoca una pequeña avalancha de trigo en uno de los contenedores abiertos.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente, ha venido a obtener el inventario del envío del diezmo».
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened containers.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz atronadora del Senescal provoca una pequeña avalancha de trigo en uno de los contenedores abiertos.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente, ha venido a obtener el inventario del envío del diezmo».

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德开了口，声如洪钟。周围某个敞开的集装箱里，堆积如山的谷物发生了一场小型雪崩。{/n}“神圣授状的持有者，行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯亲临此地，收取所有货物的资源清单。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened containers.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德开了口，声如洪钟。周围某个敞开的集装箱里，堆积如山的谷物发生了一场小型雪崩。{/n}“神圣授状的持有者，行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯亲临此地，收取所有货物的资源清单。”

languages.text: {n}家令長の轟く声は開いたコンテナの一つにある穀物に小さな雪崩を引き起こす。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下は、聖なる令状の所有者であられ、租税輸送のインベントリを回収するために来られました」
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened containers.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長の轟く声は開いたコンテナの一つにある穀物に小さな雪崩を引き起こす。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下は、聖なる令状の所有者であられ、租税輸送のインベントリを回収するために来られました」

languages.text: {n}La voix tonitruante du sénéchal déclenche une petite avalanche de grain, dans l'un des conteneurs ouverts.{/n} « Sa Seigneurie {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|détenteur|détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée, est ici pour récupérer l'inventaire de la cargaison de la dîme. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened containers.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix tonitruante du sénéchal déclenche une petite avalanche de grain, dans l'un des conteneurs ouverts.{/n} « Sa Seigneurie {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|détenteur|détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée, est ici pour récupérer l'inventaire de la cargaison de la dîme. »

languages.text: {n}Seneşal'in gür sesi, açılmış konteynerlerden birinde tahılın çığ misali devrilmesine neden oluyor.{/n} "Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin Hamili Hür Tacir {mf|Lord|Leydi} {name} von Valancius Hazretleri, aşar sevkiyatının envanterini almaya geldiler."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened containers.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seneşal'in gür sesi, açılmış konteynerlerden birinde tahılın çığ misali devrilmesine neden oluyor.{/n} "Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin Hamili Hür Tacir {mf|Lord|Leydi} {name} von Valancius Hazretleri, aşar sevkiyatının envanterini almaya geldiler."

languages.text: {n}Die dröhnende Stimme des Truchsess löst in einem der geöffneten Container eine kleine Kornlawine aus.{/n} "{mf|Seine Lordschaft, Freihändler|Ihre Ladyschaft, Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, {mf|seines Zeichens Träger|ihres Zeichens Trägerin} des heiligen Handelsbriefs, ist gekommen, um den Inventurbericht über die Zehntlieferung in Empfang zu nehmen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's booming voice causes a small avalanche of grain in one of the opened containers.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, has come to collect the inventory of the tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die dröhnende Stimme des Truchsess löst in einem der geöffneten Container eine kleine Kornlawine aus.{/n} "{mf|Seine Lordschaft, Freihändler|Ihre Ladyschaft, Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, {mf|seines Zeichens Träger|ihres Zeichens Trägerin} des heiligen Handelsbriefs, ist gekommen, um den Inventurbericht über die Zehntlieferung in Empfang zu nehmen."
